mapper.insert: insert into stats values(stats_num_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'), to_char(sysdate, 'mm'), to_char(sysdate, 'dd'), (select case to_char(sysdate,'d') when '1' then '일' when '2' then '월' when '3' then '화' when '4' then '수' when '5' then '목' when '6' then '금' when '7' then '토' end "week" from dual), 0, 'T')

insert into stats values(stats_num_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'), to_char(sysdate, 'mm'), to_char(sysdate, 'dd'), (select case to_char(sysdate,'d') when '1' then '일' when '2' then '월' when '3' then '화' when '4' then '수' when '5' then '목' when '6' then '금' when '7' then '토' end "week" from dual), 0, 'L')
mapper.update: update stats set stats_count=#{cnt} where stats_status='T' and stats_year=(select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') from dual) and stats_mon=(select to_char(sysdate, 'mm') from dual) and stats_day=(select to_char(sysdate, 'dd') from dual)
mapper.select: select nvl(max(stats_count), 0) from stats where stats_status='T' and stats_year=(select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') from dual) and stats_mon=(select to_char(sysdate, 'mm') from dual) and stats_day=(select to_char(sysdate, 'dd') from dual)
select sum(STATS_COUNT) from stats where STATS_YEAR=#{year} and stats_status='T' and stats_mon>=to_number(#{start}) and stats_mon<=to_number(#{end}) group by stats_mon ORDER BY to_number(stats_mon)

select count(*) from stats where stats_status='T' and stats_year=(select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') from dual) and stats_mon=(select to_char(sysdate, 'mm') from dual) and stats_day=(select to_char(sysdate, 'dd') from dual)
select sum(stats_count) from stats where stats_status='T' and STATS_YEAR=#{year}
select sum(STATS_COUNT) from stats where stats_status='T' and stats_year>=#{yearS} and stats_year<=#{yearE} group by stats_year ORDER BY to_number(stats_year)
select stats_count from stats where STATS_YEAR=#{year} and stats_day>=to_number(#{dayS}) and stats_day<=to_number(#{dayE}) and stats_mon=#{month} and stats_status='T' ORDER BY to_number(stats_day)
